column1: Australian actor '''Hugo Weaving''' (born 1960) played [[Elrond]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and in [[The Hobbit (film series)
Elrond is a fount of knowledge and wisdom: he knows a great deal about the history of the Ring and understands not just what has  happened but what might  happen.
column3: Hugo Weaving, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}}

column2: Whatever the outcome, the Elves will leave Middle-earth and be forgotten. There is, therefore, a sadness about Elrond which made me decide that - although he is an Elf - he also needed to have humanity, and that is what I have tried to bring to my performance.
column3: Hugo Weaving, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}}

column2: Having agreed to play Elrond, I realized how much had to be worked out about this character: the idea of portraying someone who is immortal, for one thing; plus the fact he is noble, wise, powerful, good - and beautiful! I began to think that he was altogether impossible to play!
column3: Hugo Weaving, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}}
